languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, великое ваяние Горнила вершится — Фолстоун преображается на глазах в плодородный мир с кустистыми рощами и чистыми водоемами. Однако появились свидетельства того, что Горнило также породило... людей".

"Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, великое ваяние Горнила вершится — Фолстоун преображается на глазах в плодородный мир с кустистыми рощами и чистыми водоемами. Однако появились свидетельства того, что Горнило также породило... людей".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the great sculpting of the Crucible is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with bushy groves and clean water. However, there is also evidence that the Crucible is also creating... humans".

"Lord Captain, the great sculpting of the Crucible is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with bushy groves and clean water. However, there is also evidence that the Crucible is also creating... humans".

"Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

"Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

"Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

languages.text: “舰长大人，熔炉的塑造正在不断进行。在我们的见证之下，荒寂岩地慢慢变成了富饶的世界，出现了茂盛的树林和清澈的水源。然而，有证据表明，熔炉也创造了……人类。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，熔炉的塑造正在不断进行。在我们的见证之下，荒寂岩地慢慢变成了富饶的世界，出现了茂盛的树林和清澈的水源。然而，有证据表明，熔炉也创造了……人类。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, la gran escultura del Crisol está en marcha. Rocainmunda se está transformando ante nuestros ojos en un mundo fértil con frondosas arboledas y agua limpia. Sin embargo, hay pruebas de que el Crisol también ha creado... humanos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, la gran escultura del Crisol está en marcha. Rocainmunda se está transformando ante nuestros ojos en un mundo fértil con frondosas arboledas y agua limpia. Sin embargo, hay pruebas de que el Crisol también ha creado... humanos».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、坩堝の偉大なる彫刻は進行中です...ファウルストーンは私たちの目の前で、緑豊かな木立ときれいな水を湛えた肥沃な惑星と変貌を遂げようとしています。しかし、坩堝が...人間も生み出したという証拠があるのです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、坩堝の偉大なる彫刻は進行中です...ファウルストーンは私たちの目の前で、緑豊かな木立ときれいな水を湛えた肥沃な惑星と変貌を遂げようとしています。しかし、坩堝が...人間も生み出したという証拠があるのです」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le grand œuvre du Creuset est en marche, Rochepeste se transforme sous nos yeux en un monde fertile aux bosquets luxuriants et à l'eau cristalline. Cependant, il apparaît que la relique a également donné naissance à... des êtres humains. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le grand œuvre du Creuset est en marche, Rochepeste se transforme sous nos yeux en un monde fertile aux bosquets luxuriants et à l'eau cristalline. Cependant, il apparaît que la relique a également donné naissance à... des êtres humains. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die große Formgebung des Tiegels hat begonnen. Foulstone wird vor unseren Augen in eine fruchtbare Welt mit üppigen Wäldern und sauberem Wasser verwandelt. Es gibt jedoch Beweise, dass der Tiegel auch ... Menschen produziert hat."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Crucible's great sculpting is underway — Foulstone is being transformed right before our eyes into a fertile world with lush groves and clean water. However, there is evidence that the Crucible has also created... humans."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die große Formgebung des Tiegels hat begonnen. Foulstone wird vor unseren Augen in eine fruchtbare Welt mit üppigen Wäldern und sauberem Wasser verwandelt. Es gibt jedoch Beweise, dass der Tiegel auch ... Menschen produziert hat."
